programme.desc: West Ham United v Chelsea (Kick-off 12.30pm). Coverage of the top-flight clash, which takes place at London Stadium. The Hammers have made a dreadful start to the campaign, with manager Slaven Bilic paying the price for his side's poor form and being replaced by former Everton and Manchester United boss David Moyes. The Scotsman will be hoping for a morale-boosting victory here over the champions, whose own form has picked up recently after a slight dip(n)

programme.desc: 96/97 & 97/98. Volume 3 takes us from goal 157 to goal 236, including Eric Cantona's famous chip against Sunderland and another league title for the Reds

programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals
programme.desc: 98/99 & 99/00. Volume 4 takes us from goal 237 to goal 340. The Reds recorded a historic Treble and then went goal crazy, hitting 59 to win the league in 1999/2000

programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals
programme.desc: 00/01 & 01/02. Volume 5 takes us from goal 341 to goal 429, including six of the best in one memorable afternoon against Arsenal

programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals
programme.desc: 02/03 & 03/04. Volume 6 takes us from goal 430 to goal 508. The Reds' faithful were treated to the finishing prowess of Ruud van Nistelrooy, who scored three hat-tricks in 02/03

programme.title: Jesse Lingard: Boy To FA Cup Hero
programme.desc: Jesse Lingard joined United at eight and has come through the ranks to the very top, winning the 2011 FA Youth Cup and scoring the winning goal in the 2016 FA Cup Final. This is Jesse's United story

programme.desc: United Archives. United take on Turkish champions Galatasaray in the group stage of the Champions League

programme.desc: The story of prolific striker and United legend Dennis Viollet. He was part of the Busby Babes team and a Munich Air Disaster survivor. Viollett played a massive role in the development in the USA

programme.desc: Documentary looking back at the FA Youth Cup Winning side of 1992, which yielded the likes of David Beckham, Gary Neville and Nicky Butt

programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals
programme.desc: 06/07 & 07/08. Volume 8 takes us from goal 577 to goal 669, as the Reds reclaimed their Premier League crown and Cristiano Ronaldo scored goal after goal, including 21 in a season

programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals
programme.desc: 08/09 & 09/10. Volume 9 goes from goal 670 to goal 764, including Federico Macheda's debut strike, a four-goal haul for Wayne Rooney and a dream derby winner from Michael Owen

programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals

programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals

programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals

Champions League - 6. Round: Real Madrid - Borussia (D)
programme.desc: Borussia je letos v ligi prvakov razočarala svoje navijače in si bo šele v zadnjem krogu poskušala zagotoviti tretje mesto in nadaljevanje evropske sezone v evropski ligi. Real na drugi strani še išče šampionsko formo in bo proti Nemcem zaigral na vso moč, da se svojim navijačem vsaj nekoliko odkupi za nekatere spodrsljaje v uvodnem delu sezone

programme.title: Gillette World Sport, 47. del
programme.desc: Zanimiva oddaja o največjih športnih dogodkih na svetu iz drugega zornega kota

programme.title: Champions League (m): Arkas - Zaksa
programme.desc: Liga prvakov je najmočnejše odbojkarsko klubsko tekmovanje v Evropi in na svetu. Prvič so tekmovanje izpeljali pred več kot pol stoletja. Aktualni prvaki so igralci Zenita iz Kazana, ki se lahko pohvalijo tudi z največ osvojenimi lovorikami nasploh

programme.title: Grand Slam: Tokio (2. dan)
programme.desc: Judo Grand slam serija se vrača v domovino juda, Japonsko. Kdo bo v Tokiu pokazal največ in domov odšel s kolajno okoli vratu in nasmeškom na obrazu?

programme.title: NBA: New York - Orlando
programme.desc: Liga NBA velja za najboljše košarkarsko tekmovanje na svetu, v katerem se merijo najboljši košarkarji. V ligi, ki je bila ustanovljena 6. junija 1946 v New Yorku, nastopa 30 ekip, ena od teh je kanadska. S 17 naslovi za najuspešnejšo ekipo tekmovanja v zgodovini velja Boston Celtics, v zadnjem letu pa so naslov osvojili košarkarji Golden Stata, ki so bili v finalu močnejši od Clevelanda LeBrona Jamesa

programme.title: KHL: Bars - SKA
programme.desc: S polnim imenom Kontinentalna hokejska liga za ligo NHL velja za drugo najmočnejšo hokejsko tekmovanje na svetu. Prvič so tekmovanje izvedeli leta 2008, večina sodelujočih klubov je iz Rusije, dvaindvajset, po en klub pa iz Belorusije, Latvije, Finske, Slovaške, Kazahstana in Kitajske. Naslov brani SKA iz Sankt Petersburga, ki je bil v finalu s 4:1 boljši od Metallurga iz Magnitogorska(c)

programme.title: Champions League - 6. Round: Liverpool - Spartak
programme.desc: V "mariborski" skupini F je vse še odprto. Na žalost je jasno zgolj to, da bodo slovenski prvaki sklenili sezono, preostali trije klubi pa so še vedno v igri za napredovanje. Najbolje kaže Liverpoolu, ki je še brez poraza in mu proti Spartaku zadošča že točka, pravzaprav redsi ne smejo le izgubiti in himna lige prvakov bo tudi spomladi odmevala na Anfieldu

programme.title: Live! Pokal BiH - 1/4 finale: Željezničar - Široki Brijeg
programme.desc: Žreb je določil, da se bosta Široki Brijeg in Želejzničar pomerila že v četrtfinalu pokalnega tekmovanja. Da nas čakata dva zanimiva obračuna, je jasno že ob pgledu na prvenstveno lestvico, saj eni in drugi ob Zrinjskemu zasedajo sam vrh lestvice. Zmagovalca je nemogoče napovedati, zagotovo je zgolj to, da bo vroče tako na tribunah kot na igrišču(c)

programme.title: Champions League - 6. Round: Vrhunci sredinih tekem
programme.desc: Vsi vrhunci sredinih tekem 6. kroga lige prvakov zbrani na enem mestu(c)

programme.desc: Partizan si je z zmago proti Young Boysom že zagotovil napredovanje, v Kijevu pa bi si lahko zagotovil prvo mesto in s tem vsaj na papirju lažjega nasprotnika v izločilnih bojih. Podobne načrte imajo tudi pri Dinamu, zato si lahko obetamo zanimivo srečanje do zadnje sekunde

programme.title: Live! Evroliga - 11. Round: Olimpia Milano - Khimki (vklop)
programme.desc: Milančani so ostali brez Zorana Dragića, ki se je preselil v Turčijo, tokrat pa bodo doma gostili močni Khimki. Rusi imajo spoštovanja vredno zasedbo, ki očitno še išče pravo kemijo. Bi jo lahko našla v svetovni prestolnici mode?

programme.desc: Žalgiris letos igra zelo solidno in bi se s takšno formo lahko uvrstil v končnico, za Panathinaikos je uvrstitev v izločilne boje nekaj samoumevnega, a dejstvo je, da se bodo morali Grki za zmago v "zelenem gozdu" krepko potruditi

programme.desc: Šport je sredstvo množic, kjer se sprostijo pozitivna energija in dobro počutje. Tudi zaradi tega je Trans World Sport oddaja, ki je letos praznovala že 28 letnico delovanja

programme.title: Europa League - 6. Round: Rijeka - Milan
programme.desc: Rijeka Matjaža Keka je po remiju z AEK-om ostala brez možnosti za napredovanje, vseeno pa bodo hrvaški prvaki naredili vse, da evropsko sezono sklenejo v slogu. Na Rujevicu prihaja veliki Milan, ki si je že zagotovil prvo mesto, kar bo brez dvoma pravi magnet za navijače. Bi Kekova četa lahko odpravila rdeče-črne in sezono v Evropi končala z odmevnim skalpom?

programme.title: Live! Italijanska liga (ž): Casalmaggiore - Busto Arsizio
programme.desc: Italijansko žensko državno prvenstvo v odbojki velja za eno od najstarejših na stari celini, saj so prve državne prvakinje na škornju okronali že leta 1946. V prvenstvu se meri 12 ekip, ki med seboj odločijo o naslovu najboljše ekipe v državi. Naslov brani ekipa iz Novare

programme.title: Spanish league: Prediction circle
programme.desc: Oglejte si vse zanimivosti pred novim krogom La Lige

programme.title: Live! Evroliga - 11. Round: Crvena zvezda - Anadolu Efes
programme.desc: V Beogradu nas čaka derbi začelja, saj bo Crvena zvezda gostila Anadolu Efes z Edom Murićem in Zoranom Dragićem. Eni in drugi so imeli pred sezono veliko višje cilje, zato prav veliko kalkuliranja na parketu ne bomo videli. Oboji potrebujejo zmago, kar napoveduje negotovo srečanje in boj za vsak centimeter prostora

programme.title: Live! Evroliga - 11. Round: Barcelona - Fenerbahce
programme.desc: Barcelona še vedno išče povratek na zmagovita pota, Fenerbahče pa po lanski izjemni sezoni tudi letos igra odlično in bo več kot očitno vnovič med glavnimi favoriti za končno slavje. Bi Katalonci s pomočjo svojih navijačev lahko zaustavili ekipo Željka Obradovića in pred nadaljevanjem sezone dobili prepotrebno dozo samozavesti?

programme.title: UEFA Champions League: Magazin
programme.desc: Branilec naslova najmočnejšega klubskega nogometnega tekmovanja v Evropi je madridski Real, ki je po zmagi proti Juventusu sploh kot prvi ubranil naslov v sedanjem formatu Lige prvakov. Kdo pa bo najmočnejše evropsko klubsko tekmovanje osvojil v novi sezoni? Vse zanimivosti o najelitnejšem evropskem klubskem tekmovanju izveste v tedenskem magazinu

programme.desc: Oglejte si vse zanimivosti pred novim krogom Premier lige

programme.title: Evroliga - 11. Round: Olympiacos - Real Madrid
programme.desc: Luka Dončić bo Real tokrat popeljal v vroči Pirej, kjer ga čaka Olympiacos. Grki so ob CSKA-ju letos pokazali največ in bodo tudi srečanje proti kraljevemu klubu začeli v vlogi rahlega favorita. Pri Realu tudi tokrat največ pričakujejo od Dončića, ki jih zagotovo ne bo razočaral(n)

programme.title: Spanish league: Alaves - Las Palmas
programme.desc: Španska nogometna liga, bolj poznana pod vzdevkom La Liga, je najelitnejše nogometno tekmovanje v Španiji. Ustanovljena je bila leta 1929. V ligi nastopa 20 klubov, kjer vsako sezono nekdo postane prvak in izpade v špansko drugo ligo. Najuspešnejša kluba sta madridski Real in Barcelona. Skupaj sta ligo osvojila kar 56-krat. Zadnji naslov je romal v roke madridskega Reala(n)

programme.title: Italijanska liga (m): Grotte - Sora
programme.desc: Lega Pallavolo Serie A je najprestižnejše ligaško odbojkarsko tekmovanje v Italiji. V njej nastopa 13 ekip. Aktualni državni prvaki so odbojkarji Modene. Lega Palavolo Serie A velja za najboljšo odbojkarsko ligo na svetu(n)

The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, `Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia. (live) (cc)(n)

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: Polarizing football coach Bill McCartney and his revitalization of the Colorado Buffaloes is chronicled, examining off-the-field lows as well as the high of a 1990 national title. McCartney was founder of the Promise Keepers, a Christian men's ministry. Directed by Jim Podhoretz. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: The rise, fall and rebirth of SMU football is chronicled in "Pony Exce$$." Craig James and Eric Dickerson highlighted the Mustangs' heyday of the early '80s, but rules violations led to the program's demise in 1987. Directed by Thaddeus D. Matula, a graduate of SMU's film school. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: MAC Football Championship: Akron vs. Toledo
programme.desc: Akron (7-5) vs. Toledo (10-2). From Ford Field in Detroit. The Zips and Rockets are in the final for the first time in over a decade. Since falling to Toledo 48-21 on Oct. 21, Terry Bowden's Akron squad has been sparked by fleet freshman QB Kato Nelson. (cc)

programme.title: American Athletic Football Championship: Memphis at Central Florida
programme.desc: Memphis (10-1) at Central Florida (11-0). From Spectrum Stadium. A New Year's Six bowl berth is likely on the line in the second meeting of these potent squads. Memphis has averaged 53.5 ppg since falling to Scott Frost's Knights 40-13 here on Sept. 30. (cc)

programme.title: Mountain West Football Championship: Fresno State at Boise State
programme.desc: Fresno State (9-3) at Boise State (9-3). From Albertsons Stadium. Jeff Tedford's Bulldogs downed Boise 28-17 last week to cap an FBS-best eight-game improvement over last year's record. QB Marcus McMaryion faces a defense led by LB Leighton Vander Esch. (cc)

programme.title: The Dan Le Batard Show with Stugotz
programme.desc: Simulcast of the opinionated and humorous Miami Herald sports columnnist's radio program, alongside co-host Stugotz (Jon Weiner). (live) (cc)

programme.title: College Football: Troy at Arkansas State
programme.desc: Troy (9-2) at Arkansas State (7-3). From Centennial Bank Stadium. At least a share of the Sun Belt title is on the line as the Red Wolves bid for their fifth straight win over Troy. Both teams enter the day tied with Appalachian State with 6-1 records. (cc)

programme.desc: It's rifle season in Missouri and Steve Filley comes a little too close to a big buck while self-filming from the ground

programme.title: Whitetail Explorer
programme.desc: Mark Beck spot-and-stalked a 200" mule deer earlier in the season, and is now after big whitetails in South Dakota, Illinois and the sleeper state of Oklahoma, where Mark is after a freaky big buck

programme.title: Dominant Bucks
programme.desc: Learn the Dominant Buck tactics of Kansas buck hunter Jared Gant. Jared demonstrates his do-it-yourself tactics to capturing a successful buck on video

programme.title: Respect the Game TV
programme.desc: Pro shooter Chance Beaubeaf joins Weston Clark and team on an elk hunt

programme.title: Big Deer TV
programme.desc: Hoping to hit the peak rut just right, Mike and friends head to Alabama for one last hunt in late January

programme.title: GunVenture
programme.desc: An active shooter attacks students in a community college classroom

programme.title: Guns & Gear
programme.desc: Hitting the field with Sig Sauer optics, including the ROMEO6; the Thompson Center Compass rifle; and Barnes Bullets' VOR-TX LR ammo for long range. Also: the Calvin Elite AR trigger from Timney Triggers and the Walther Creed pistol

programme.title: Jon Baker's Guide 4 Adventure
programme.desc: Alaskan moose hunt of a lifetime as Warren Stratton and Bradley Bonnett join Jon Baker in Alaska's vast wilderness

programme.title: Predator Nation
programme.desc: Fred shows why using a suppressor can be deadly on coyotes and gentle on your ears

programme.title: Trailing the Hunter's Moon
programme.desc: Blake Barnett and Larry Weishuhn are in far west Texas helping Greg Smons to remove a few coyotes on his mule deer property to increase the fawn survival rate

programme.title: Trijicon's World of Sports Afield
programme.desc: Dan Catlin joins good friend, Jim Hall, in the breath-taking high country of New Zealand's South Island

programme.title: Hornady's Dark & Dangerous
programme.desc: Neil Emory tries to close with a buffalo in Nuanetsi. Then, we travel to Mozambique to join Chris Sells where he begins a safari that tests Heym's new double. Finally, we're back in the Zambezi Valley where Clay Eifling is tracking elephant bull

programme.title: Petersen's Hunting Adventures
programme.desc: Part 1. Join Craig Boddington and Steve Hornady on a bucket list safari in Uganda. Tag along as they hunt Nile buffalo, track plains game across the long-grass savannah and fish the headwaters of the mighty Nile on this epic adventure

programme.title: Savage Outdoors
programme.desc: Mike and the crew are back in south Texas for their third week of hunting

programme.title: Buckventures' The Woodsman
programme.desc: Jeff Danker and Buddy Groom attempt to seize success during a warm, Ohio rut hunt

programme.title: Predator Nation
programme.desc: Fred shows why using a suppressor can be deadly on coyotes and gentle on your ears(n)

programme.title: Out-There TV
programme.desc: Corey heads to Poverty Canyon Whitetails(n)

programme.title: Relentless Pursuit
programme.desc: Part 1. Tim and his girlfriend head to Alberta in search of monster mulies. Giant antlers rise from the long grass(n)

programme.title: Full Draw Adventures
programme.desc: Hunting in his home state of Ohio, Ryan Lawwell encounters one giant after another in his pursuit of the right buck. The challenge is amplified as he takes on the duties of filming during a season that proves to be a buck parade(n)

programme.title: Wild Outdoors
programme.desc: Last spring, The Wild Outdoors decided to film their turkey hunts live on Facebook. This show highlights the good and bad of that decision(n)

programme.title: Hardcore Pursuit
programme.desc: The boys get a break from the cold and snow as they head to south Texas to hunt monster bucks of the Brush Country with Bear bows and good friend James Saunders at The 501. They've hunted with James many times and always have a great hunt(n)

programme.title: Outback Outdoors
programme.desc: Dave Beronio draws a Nevada sheep tag and takes a deeper look into why hunters truly are great conservationists. Also: a look at what they are doing to make sure the bighorn population remains healthy and strong for future generations(n)

programme.title: Whitetail Slam
programme.desc: Hunters attempt to kill four deer from among eight whitetail sub-groups(n)

programme.title: The Outfitters

programme.title: Big Deer TV
programme.desc: Hoping to hit the peak rut just right, Mike and friends head to Alabama for one last hunt in late January(n)

programme.title: Hollywood Hunter

programme.desc: Get ready for action-packed deer hunts as we bring to you the best of highlights with the Hollywood Hunter and friends. It's all about the experience, camaraderie and excitement of the hunt(n)

programme.title: Pigman: The Series
programme.desc: After the state of Texas announces they are considering using poison on the feral pig population, Pigman takes to the sky for a day of hog extermination from the chopper(n)

programme.title: Brotherhood Outdoors
programme.desc: Ronnie Carver shares his history as a proud member of his local auto workers union. He discusses his passion for forestry and tours his certified family forest. When he heads to Canada to experience a bear hunt, he fulfills a family dream(n)

programme.title: On The Road With Rock & Aaron
programme.desc: Rock kicks back with the family doing a little hunting and mudding at his high-fence ranch at River Run, Texas, while Aaron hunts for whitetail in Ohio(n)

programme.title: Razor Dobbs Alive
programme.desc: Razor hunts wildebeest and zebra in Africa with his 10mm auto pistol(n)

programme.title: The Hunt

programme.title: In-Fisherman
programme.desc: It's all about select lures and sleight of hand, as the staff tinkers with rubberskirted jigs for largemouths and shows how to sweet-swim finesse jigs for smallmouths(n)

programme.title: ConQuest 200

programme.title: Jon Baker's Guide 4 Adventure
programme.desc: Alaskan moose hunt of a lifetime as Warren Stratton and Bradley Bonnett join Jon Baker in Alaska's vast wilderness(n)

programme.title: Avian-X TV
programme.desc: On the way home, Fred stops by PTO in Kansas to visit Zach White. A large number of lesser Canada geese and specklebellies in the area quickly become the topic of discussion as Fred sees opportunity for one last stack to cap the 2016-17 season(n)
